documents.title: Documents
documents.subtitle: Manage and explore your document library

empty.title: No documents found

delete.title: Delete Document
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{filename}}"?
delete.warning: This action cannot be undone. The document file and all associated data will be permanently removed.

bulkDelete.title: Delete Multiple Documents
bulkDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected document{{plural}}?
bulkDelete.warning: This action cannot be undone. All selected documents and their associated data will be permanently removed.

documentDetails.subtitle: Comprehensive document analysis and metadata viewer

ocr.expandTooltip: Expand to view full text with search

tagsLabels.title: 🏷️ Tags & Labels

ocrExpanded.title: 🔍 Extracted Text (OCR) - Full View
ocrExpanded.noText: No OCR text available for this document.

processedImage.title: Processed Image - OCR Enhancement Applied
processedImage.description: This is the enhanced image that was actually processed by the OCR engine. You can adjust OCR enhancement settings in the Settings page.

editLabels.title: Edit Document Labels
editLabels.description: Select labels to assign to this document

delete.title: Delete Document
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{filename}}?
delete.details: This will permanently remove the document and all associated data including OCR text, labels, and processing history.

ignoredFiles.title: Ignored Files
ignoredFiles.subtitle: View and manage files that were intentionally ignored during processing

empty.title: No Ignored Files
empty.subtitle: No files have been ignored. All processed files were successfully handled.

noResults.title: No Results Found
noResults.subtitle: No ignored files match your current filters. Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.

reasons.duplicate_hash: Duplicate Hash - File already exists in the system
reasons.file_too_large: File Too Large - Exceeds maximum size limit
reasons.unsupported_format: Unsupported Format - File type not supported
reasons.file_corrupted: File Corrupted - Cannot read or process file

tabs.failedDocumentsTooltip: View and manage documents that failed during processing (OCR, ingestion, validation, etc.)
tabs.cleanupTooltip: Manage and clean up documents with quality issues - low OCR confidence or failed processing
tabs.duplicatesTooltip: View and manage duplicate document groups - documents with identical content
tabs.ignoredFilesTooltip: Manage files that have been ignored during sync operations

advancedRetry.title: Advanced Retry Options
advancedRetry.description: Use advanced filtering and selection options to retry specific subsets of failed documents based on file type, failure reason, size, and more.

alerts.noFailedMessage: No documents have failed OCR processing. All your documents are processing successfully.
alerts.overviewMessage: These documents failed at various stages of processing: ingestion, validation, OCR, storage, etc. Use the filters above to narrow down by failure stage or specific reason. You can retry processing for recoverable failures.

retry.queuedSuccess: OCR retry queued for "{{filename}}". Estimated wait time: {{minutes}} minutes.
retry.bulkSuccess: Successfully queued {{count}} documents for OCR retry. Estimated processing time: {{minutes}} minutes.
retry.bulkFailed: Failed to retry documents. Please try again.
retry.requeuedSuccess: Successfully queued {{count}} failed documents for OCR retry. Check the queue stats for progress.
retry.noFailedDocuments: No failed documents found to retry
retry.requeuedFailed: Failed to retry all failed OCR documents
retry.advancedSuccess: Successfully queued {{queued}} of {{matched}} documents for retry. Estimated processing time: {{minutes}} minutes.

cleanup.previewFailed: Failed to preview low confidence documents
cleanup.deleteFailed: Failed to delete low confidence documents

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please refresh the page and log in again.
errors.permissionDenied: You do not have permission to view failed documents.
errors.noFailedDocumentsFound: No failed documents found or they may have been processed.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.permissionDeniedDuplicates: You do not have permission to view duplicate documents.
errors.documentNotFound: Document not found. It may have been deleted or processed already.
errors.cannotRetry: Document cannot be retried due to processing issues. Please check the document format.
errors.permissionDeniedRetry: You do not have permission to retry OCR processing.
errors.serverErrorSupport: Server error. Please try again later or contact support.
errors.permissionDeniedIgnored: You do not have permission to view ignored files.

watchFolder.title: Watch Folder
watchFolder.directoryNotExist: Your personal watch directory doesn't exist yet. Create it to start uploading files to your own dedicated folder.
watchFolder.unableToLoad: Unable to load personal watch directory information. Please try refreshing the page.
watchFolder.systemWideInfo: This is the system-wide watch folder configuration. All users can view this information.
watchFolder.watchFolderDescription: The watch folder system automatically monitors the configured directory for new files and processes them for OCR.

pipelineSteps.fileDetection: File Detection: New files are detected using hybrid watching (inotify + polling)
pipelineSteps.validation: Validation: Files are checked for supported format and size limits
pipelineSteps.deduplication: Deduplication: System prevents processing of duplicate files
pipelineSteps.storage: Storage: Files are moved to the document storage system
pipelineSteps.ocrQueue: OCR Queue: Documents are queued for OCR processing with priority

watchFolder.hybridStrategyInfo: The system uses a hybrid watching strategy that automatically detects filesystem type and chooses the optimal monitoring approach (inotify for local filesystems, polling for network mounts).

ocrConfiguration.title: OCR Configuration
ocrConfiguration.description: Configure languages for OCR text extraction. Multiple languages help with mixed-language documents.
ocrConfiguration.autoDetectLanguageCombinationHelper: Automatically suggest optimal language combinations based on document content analysis
ocrConfiguration.concurrentOcrJobsHelper: Number of OCR jobs that can run simultaneously
ocrConfiguration.ocrTimeoutHelper: Maximum time for OCR processing per file

ocrControls.title: OCR Processing Controls (Admin Only)
ocrControls.description: Control OCR processing to manage CPU usage and allow users to use the application without performance impact.
ocrControls.ocrPausedMessage: OCR processing is paused. No new jobs will be processed.
ocrControls.ocrActiveMessage: OCR processing is active. Documents will be processed automatically.
ocrControls.pausedAlertMessage: New documents will not be processed for OCR text extraction until processing is resumed. Users can still upload and view documents, but search functionality may be limited.

fileProcessing.title: File Processing
fileProcessing.maxFileSizeHelper: Maximum allowed file size for uploads
fileProcessing.autoRotateImagesHelper: Automatically detect and correct image orientation
fileProcessing.enableImagePreprocessingHelper: Enhance images for better OCR accuracy (deskew, denoise, contrast)
fileProcessing.preprocessingWarning: ⚠️ Warning: Enabling preprocessing can significantly alter OCR text results and may reduce accuracy for some documents
fileProcessing.enableBackgroundOcrHelper: Process OCR in the background after file upload

searchConfiguration.title: Search Configuration
searchConfiguration.snippetLengthHelper: Characters to show in search result previews

storageManagement.title: Storage Management
storageManagement.retentionDaysHelper: Auto-delete documents after X days (leave empty to disable)
storageManagement.enableAutoCleanupHelper: Automatically remove orphaned files and clean up storage
storageManagement.enableCompressionHelper: Compress stored documents to save disk space

enhancementControls.title: Enhancement Controls
enhancementControls.skipEnhancement: Skip All Image Enhancement (Use Original Images Only)
enhancementControls.brightnessBoostHelper: Manual brightness adjustment (0 = auto, >0 = boost amount)

qualityThresholds.title: Quality Thresholds (when to apply enhancements)
qualityThresholds.brightnessThresholdHelper: Enhance if brightness below this value (0-255)
qualityThresholds.contrastThresholdHelper: Enhance if contrast below this value (0-1)
qualityThresholds.noiseThresholdHelper: Enhance if noise above this value (0-1)
qualityThresholds.sharpnessThresholdHelper: Enhance if sharpness below this value (0-1)

advancedProcessing.title: Advanced Processing Options
advancedProcessing.adaptiveThresholdWindowSizeHelper: Window size for contrast enhancement (odd number)

dialogs.newPassword: New Password (leave empty to keep current)

confirmRemoveDirectory.title: Remove Watch Directory
confirmRemoveDirectory.message: Are you sure you want to remove the watch directory for user "{{username}}"? This action cannot be undone and will stop monitoring their directory for new files.

serverConfiguration.title: Server Configuration (Admin Only)
serverConfiguration.loadFailed: Failed to load server configuration. Admin access may be required.

stats.documentsStoredTooltip: Total number of documents currently stored from this source
stats.ocrProcessedTooltip: Number of documents that have been successfully OCR'd
stats.lastSyncTooltip: When this source was last synchronized
stats.filesPendingTooltip: Files discovered but not yet processed during sync
stats.totalSizeTooltip: Total size of files successfully downloaded from this source

webdav.name: WebDAV
webdav.description: Nextcloud, ownCloud, and other WebDAV servers

s3.name: S3 Compatible
s3.description: AWS S3, MinIO, and other S3-compatible storage

localFolder.title: Local Folder Configuration
localFolder.description: Monitor local filesystem directories for new documents. Ensure the application has read access to the specified paths.

s3.title: S3 Compatible Storage Configuration
s3.description: Connect to AWS S3, MinIO, or any S3-compatible storage service. For MinIO, provide the endpoint URL of your server.
s3.endpointUrlHelper: Leave empty for AWS S3, or provide custom endpoint for MinIO/other S3-compatible storage
s3.objectPrefixHelper: Optional prefix to limit scanning to specific object keys

common.foldersDesc: Specify the folders within your source to monitor for new documents
common.extensionsDesc: File types to sync and process with OCR.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Configure automatic sync and advanced options
advanced.autoSyncDesc: Automatically sync files on a schedule
advanced.autoSyncDescLocal: Automatically scan for new files on a schedule
advanced.autoSyncDescS3: Automatically check for new objects on a schedule
advanced.syncIntervalHelper: How often to check for new files (15 min - 24 hours)
advanced.syncIntervalHelperLocal: How often to scan for new files (15 min - 24 hours)
advanced.syncIntervalHelperS3: How often to check for new objects (15 min - 24 hours)

estimation.title: Crawl Estimation
estimation.description: Estimate how many files will be processed and how long it will take.

sync.quickSyncDesc: Fast incremental sync using ETags. Only processes new or changed files.
sync.deepScanDesc: Complete rescan that resets ETag expectations. Use for troubleshooting sync issues.

delete.title: Delete Source
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this source?
delete.warning: This action cannot be undone. All sync history and settings will be lost.
